title: Outdoor paiting flow & Sound Healing Meditation
description: A relaxing art therapy session focused on self-expression through painting. Just bring your emotions and curiosity.

title: Sound Bath Meditation Circle
description: Experience deep relaxation with the healing frequencies of crystal singing bowls, gongs, and chimes. Limited spots available.

title: Inner Child Art Workshop
description: Reconnect with your inner child through guided creative activities in a supportive group setting. Materials included.

title: Sound & Silence: Evening Journey
description: A unique blend of guided silence, breathwork, and immersive sound therapy. Let go of tension and ground your energy.

title: Creative Journaling & Mindfulness
description: Explore your thoughts and emotions through therapeutic journaling, collage art, and mindfulness prompts in a group setting.
